function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential false positive or false negative results in COVID-19 screening due to voice detection technology.","Impact":"Misidentification of COVID-19 patients leading to delayed testing or unnecessary testing.","Mitigation":"Validation of voice detection accuracy against other testing methods, regular updates and improvements to the technology.","Technologies":"Voice detection platforms, AI algorithms for accuracy validation.","People":"Individuals being screened for COVID-19.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology developers."},{"Description":"Reliance on AI for accurate diagnosis of COVID-19 mutations.","Impact":"Failure to detect new virus mutations leading to delayed treatment or vaccine development.","Mitigation":"Continuous monitoring and improvement of AI algorithms, collaboration with virology research for mutation detection.","Technologies":"Robust AI devices and algorithms, collaboration with virology research.","People":"Researchers, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Research organizations, healthcare institutions."},{"Description":"False identification of potential drug treatments for COVID-19 through AI analysis.","Impact":"Use of ineffective or harmful drugs in treatment, delaying the discovery of effective treatments.","Mitigation":"Thorough validation and testing of drug candidates, collaboration with medical experts for verification.","Technologies":"AI drug discovery algorithms, medical validation processes.","People":"Patients receiving drug treatments, medical researchers.","Owner":"Medical research organizations, drug development companies."}]}
